text:
="preserve">William Walter Barlow (February 20, 1931 – July 5, 2020) was a Canadian politician and businessman. He was in the Legislative Assembly of Ontario from 1981 to 1987. He was a member of the Progressive Conservative Party. Barlow was born in Cambridge, Ontario.
Barlow died at home in Cambridge on July 5, 2020 at the age of 89.
